name: Family Candy Farm
description:
Match-3 On the Beach with Candy is the best Top 10 Match 3 Game

Discover how to destroy little bubble like a total Farm Frenzy Mania Addict or just to relax yourself on the Beach with Candy and fun :)

Your mission is very simple, you just have to crush all the family of bubbles heroes mania in the iceland of puzzle story when 3 of them have the same color.

The interface is very cool and very relaxing to introduce you in a candy heroes saga World where normally just children have the keys!

Awesome game nice candy jelly good music with interesting game where its so colourful of wonderland simulator puzzle story saga and attractive everybody should download this game , the game is very addictive time killer and Very entertaining game which can become quite habit forming,
